article_title: BREAKING: Vatican recognizes State of Palestine
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

The treaty, not yet signed, makes clear the Holy See has switched its diplomatic relations from the Palestinian Liberation Organization to the state of Palestine.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Institutions, Politics, Catholic, Christian, islam, Palestine, Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas, Vatican
